sections.heading: Reapportioning Wards or Districts; Cities Nominating or Electing Governing Bodies Not Required to Reapportion.
sections.text:
No city which nominates or elects all or part of its governing body from wards or districts shall be required to reapportion its wards or districts based on census data earlier than that contained in the 1970 decennial census.

History:1968, Act 285, Imd. Eff. July 1, 1968
